docs.snippet: United States policy in Latin America was assayed last night by former President Galo Plaza of Ecuador. He found elements both approved and disapproved by the twenty other American Republics.

docs.snippet: There is no doubt that some persons were hurt in the streets of Havana last Wednesday night at about the time that an airplane passed over the city dropping anti-Castro leaflets. There is some question as to whether the damage was done by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: There is no doubt that some persons were hurt in the streets of Havana last Wednesday night at about the time that an airplane passed over the city dropping anti-Castro leaflets. There is some question as to whether the damage was done by the intruding airplane, by gangsters who fired indiscriminately on the crowds from speeding motor cars or by the efforts of the Cuban Air Force to bring the trespasser down.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 2 -- The Political Committee of the General Assembly gave its unanimous endorsement today to a resolution referring proposals for disarmament to a ten-nation disarmament group that will meet in Geneva early next year.
